Class OfficeCentre

java.lang.Object
KI305.Kozak.Lab3.Building
KI305.Kozak.Lab3.OfficeCentre
All Implemented Interfaces:
Loggable, Workplace
public class OfficeCentre extends Building implements Workplace, Loggable
Represents a specialized Builidng that serves as an office center. In addition to standard building properties, this class contains the company name and employee count. It also implements Workplace and Loggable interfaces, to see if office is open and to log it respectively
